item.title: CVE-2024-33907|2024-08-02T02:42:59.797Z -- michael%20nelson -- print%20my%20blog
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Michael Nelson Print My Blog.This issue affects Print My Blog: from n/a through 3.26.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-37271|2024-07-22T08:44:48.776Z -- michael%20nelson -- print%20my%20blog
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Michael Nelson Print My Blog allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Print My Blog: from n/a through 3.27.0.
